displayProperties.description: We treated the ship like its name, like one of the Guardians of old. But I swear to you that Sparrows have personalities, even spirits. I know that sounds crazy, but I believe that. AA's name was cold, and the Sparrow was cold. You couldn't warm it up. But boy it could fly.
displayProperties.name: Azure Azazyel

subtitle: Primarily used on the ice caps of Mars during the Golden Age.
